body:
Omg omg so this is part 1. Ughhhhh this is so good. The character designs are beautiful as well as the setting.
The sequels are gonna have reverse harem, which is even better.

Ok, so this is a great series with lovely art and an interesting plot to balance out the smut. Yes the concept just sounds like an excuse for sex, but I've never been so invested in a story with a title so porny, and it sucks that this hidden gem will go unnoticed because it hasn't all been translated for free. If you can't read the other chapters, you'd never know (SPOILERS ALERT) Lloyd is actually super protective of Alto, or that his cousin Ruhm has an inferiority complex buried under his kindness, or that Alto beat out tons of ppl in multiple librarian exams subjects (despite growing up out in the country where a famine killed his two siblings), and you haven't met Alto's sus af boss Vaisel! There are moments where Lune actually respects Alto as more than a sex object, times where Lloyd pines hard, a whole investigation connecting the cursed chocolate to a theft from the university magic department...There's character and relationship complexity and I wish more ppl could see it all
More! I like the art and the story!!
NEXT! As far as i know it have 5 sequel or more? I think.
Why does shotacon turn into a big tittied woman, he would look so good as a loli or just with flat chest :(
So like, they have sex TWICE everyday?
why are this stories with good smutty art always gender bender
Fuck!! It's unfinished!! It's cliff hanger!!
Is there gonna be a sequel?
......... does anyone know a good mind bleach?
Ranma  1/2 but instead of water,  it is  semen
